body_html:
Thanks for the response:

I think that there are 3 options here:

  1. Install Cuda on machines (the downside is that it is painful on developer machines)
  2. build GPU and CPU docker images
  3. build one docker image, and install both GPU and CPU tensorflow versions with virtual env

I will have to think about what suits us best...

Thanks guys for your time.
Keep up the good work :)
